[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

If you have a burning question or would like to be a part of the awards we’d be thrilled to assist.

Contact us using the details provided below.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”1.5em||0px||false|false” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#CCCCCC” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Sponsorship Enquiries

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/08/ollie-russell2.jpg” title_text=”ollie-russell2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Ollie Russell

Sales & Partnerships Manager

ollie.russell@hellopartner.com

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”1.5em||0px||false|false” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#CCCCCC” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Entry Queries & Logistics

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/01/Annie-Miekus.jpg” alt=”Harriet Edwards” title_text=”Annie-Miekus” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Annie Miekus

Awards Manager

annie.miekus@hellopartner.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/08/gerry-villiers.jpeg” alt=”Harriet Edwards” title_text=”gerry-villiers” _builder_version=”4.16″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ module_class=”pi-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Gerry Villiers

Awards Manager

gerry.villiers@hellopartner.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

IMA HQ

The Influencer Marketing Awards
Existem Events Ltd
1 Victoria Street
Bristol, BS1 6AA, UK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]
